name: virtual-wallet-system
description: Complete Virtual Wallet System with hexagonal architecture

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/database-service && npm run build && cd ../api-gateway-service && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:db" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend/database-service && npm test && cd ../api-gateway-service && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend/database-service && npm run lint && cd ../api-gateway-service && npm run lint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend/database-service && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist && cd ../api-gateway-service && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist
